question: [提问方式1]SM311LM V3.30 Parameters

answer: <Brief>The SM311LM V3.30 is a 1000BASE-SX multi-mode SFP transceiver supporting 1.25 Gbps data rates and IEEE 802.3z standards. It features Digital Diagnostic Monitoring (DDM), hot-swappable capability, and transmission distances up to 550 m over 50/125μm or 62.5/125μm multi-mode fiber. With an LC/UPC port and 850 nm wavelength, this compact module (55.4 x 13.7 x 12.9 mm) operates in temperatures from 0°C to 70°C, ensuring reliable performance for high-speed networking applications.</Brief><Specification>Standards and Protocols | IEEE 802.3z, CSMA/CD, TCP/IP

answer: <Brief>The EAP723 (EU) V1 is a high-performance dual-band Wi-Fi 6E access point designed for ceiling, wall, or junction box mounting. It features a 2.5G Ethernet port and supports 802.3at PoE or 12V DC power. With internal antennas, it operates on 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands, offering combined speeds up to 3570 Mbps. The device supports advanced features like 4K-QAM, MU-MIMO, and OFDMA, enhancing wireless performance and efficiency. It offers excellent low-light performance with a minimum illumination of 0.005 Lux and IR night vision up to 30m. The camera supports two-way audio, advanced AI-powered smart events, and people and vehicle analytics. With IP67 waterproof and IK10 vandal-proof ratings, it's suitable for outdoor use. The camera offers flexible installation with PoE or 12V DC power options and supports onboard storage up to 512GB.
